characterDescription:
Naget is a darkeyed Alethi farmer from Hearthstone. He is amongst the boys that Kaladin addresses at the foot of a hill in a field where they should've been worming. (Farmers usually went over their hills three or four times, fertilizing as they went.)
Naget states to Kaladin that he (Kaladin) knows things, about the world and such. Further, he asks Kaladin if he (Kaladin) had heard of a darkeyes becoming a lighteyes. Kaladin responds in the affirmative, that wealthy darkeyed merchants marry lowborn lighteyes and join their family, then maybe have lighteyed children.

characterDetails.Appearance: Naget is light-haired, spindly and tall.
